title: Return of skins
body: Hey guys i have question if i get skin as gift from friend (eve skins) and i dont like new eve can i write to riot and they will refund this skins for me ? (sorry for bad english)

replies.body: We don't currently offer refunds due to reworks.  Even though it was a gift, we wouldn't be able to offer a refund if it was unlocked by yourself as well.  What is it about the skin that's got you disliking it?
